summary: Adds the vampire jewelry under jewelry crafting at the forge
descriptionHtml:
This is a quick and easy mod for those who sided with the Dawnguard but still want access to the lovely new jewelry meshes the vampires get with the radiant fetch quests. 
Honestly I wasn\'t going to do the creepy skull amulets but i was doing everything else so I just tossed em in.

Based on textures they are divided into 4 material combos,
Ebony/Sapphire
Moonstone/Garnet
Quicksilver/Ruby
Corundum/Emerald

There is a ring and a necklace for each combo. Also added was the (apparently) missing recipe for the bone hawk ring, a super unique item that is 3 rings with a hooked claw instead of a stone, very cool and there was only one in the whole game. 
All the recipes are consistent with existing jewelry, prices may be a bit wonky for the base items but the purpose of this mod is for cosmetic enchanting reasons so I didn\'t spend much time thinking about it.

The mod has been cleaned and should have no references to anything except to 9 recipes and 8 new items of jewelry.
This mod was originally for personal use, but because its so straightforward and potentially useful for folks who dont like \"major Overhauls\" of craftable stuff, I thought I would release it. 
No expansions are likely, if I do add more jewelry from my own library of meshes then I will release it as a separate mod.

This mod REQUIRES patch 1.8, sorry to those who were having issues related to this.
author: Star Boi
